name: Shadow
description: You learned to keep secrets, to observe, and to strike unseen.

feature.name: Silent Network
feature.description: You have contacts in the underworld who pass along rumors and information. You can send and receive messages through criminal channels.

traits.text: I speak in riddles and half-truths.
I never use my real name.
I watch exits in every room.
I am paranoid about being followed.
I speak softly so others must lean in.
I remember faces but forget names on purpose.

ideals.text: Loyalty. My network is my family.
Redemption. I want to leave this life behind.
People. I help those who cannot help themselves.
Power. Knowledge is the greatest power.

bonds.text: I owe my life to a contact.
I work to bring down a corrupt organization.
I protect someone who doesn't know what I do.
I stole something I cannot fence.
My mentor was killed; I seek answers.

flaws.text: I cannot resist a valuable secret.
I betray people if the price is right.
I am always looking for an angle.
I trust no one, not even allies.
My past catches up with me at the worst times.
